hairline.description: Whether to display a thin border for the button
hairline.description_zh: 是否显示按钮的细边框

type.description: The style type of the button

shape.description: The shape of the button is described above
shape.description_zh: 按钮外观形状，见上方说明

plain.description: Whether the button is hollowed out and the background color is transparent
plain.description_zh: 按钮是否镂空，背景色透明

loading.description: Whether the button name is preceded by a loading icon
loading.description_zh: 按钮名称前是否带 loading 图标

openType.description: For more information, please refer to the description of the button component of Uniapp Stability
openType.description_zh: 开放能力，具体请看uniapp稳定关于button组件部分说明

formType.description: For <form> components, clicking on them will trigger <form> the submit/reset event for each component
formType.description_zh: 用于 <form> 组件，点击分别会触发 <form> 组件的 submit/reset 事件

appParameter.description: When opening the APP, the parameters passed to the APP are valid when open-type=launchApp (Note: only WeChat Mini Program and QQ Mini Program are valid)
appParameter.description_zh: 打开 APP 时，向 APP 传递的参数，open-type=launchApp时有效 （注：只微信小程序、QQ小程序有效）

hoverStopPropagation.description: Specify whether to prevent the ancestor node of this node from appearing in the click state, and the WeChat Mini Program is valid (true by default)
hoverStopPropagation.description_zh: 指定是否阻止本节点的祖先节点出现点击态，微信小程序有效（默认 true）

lang.description: Specify the language in which the user information is returned, zh_CN Chinese Simplified, zh_TW Chinese Traditional, EN English
lang.description_zh: 指定返回用户信息的语言，zh_CN 简体中文，zh_TW 繁体中文，en 英文

sendMessageTitle.description: The title of the in-session message card is valid if openType="contact".
sendMessageTitle.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片标题，openType="contact"时有效

sendMessagePath.description: The in-session message card is valid when you click to jump to the path of the Mini Program, openType="contact".
sendMessagePath.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片点击跳转小程序路径，openType="contact"时有效

sendMessageImg.description: 会话内消息卡片图片,openType="contact"时有效
sendMessageImg.description_zh: 会话内消息卡片图片,openType="contact"时有效

showMessageCard.description: Whether to display the in-session message card, set this parameter to true, the user will enter the customer service session will display a prompt of "Mini Program may be sent" in the lower right corner, and the user can quickly send the Mini Program message after clicking, which is valid when openType="contact".
showMessageCard.description_zh: 是否显示会话内消息卡片，设置此参数为 true，用户进入客服会话会在右下角显示"可能要发送的小程序"提示，用户点击后可以快速发送小程序消息，openType="contact"时有效

dataName.description: Additional parameter parameters, which are used for the data-xxx attribute of the Mini Program, are obtained through the target.dataset.name
dataName.description_zh: 额外传参参数，用于小程序的data-xxx属性，通过target.dataset.name获取

throttleTime.description: Throttling can only be triggered once within a certain period of time, in milliseconds
throttleTime.description_zh: 节流，一定时间内只能触发一次，单位毫秒

hoverStartTime.description: How long after you press and hold it to appear clicked, in milliseconds
hoverStartTime.description_zh: 按住后多久出现点击态，单位毫秒

hoverStayTime.description: The retention time of the click state after the finger is released, in milliseconds
hoverStayTime.description_zh: 手指松开后点击态保留时间，单位毫秒

text.description: The reason why the button text is passed in via props is because of the slot (note: the style of the text cannot be controlled in nvue)
text.description_zh: 按钮文字，之所以通过props传入，是因为slot传入的话（注：nvue中无法控制文字的样式）

iconColor.default: 在plain=true镂空状态下，颜色与边框保持一致，否则为白色（主题为info时为黑色#000000）

color.description: Button color, support incoming linear-gradient gradient color
color.description_zh: 按钮颜色，支持传入linear-gradient渐变色

customStyle.description: Define the external styles that need to be used, see the document above for details
customStyle.description_zh: 定义需要用到的外部样式,详细见上方文档

events.name: click
events.description: button click, do not use @tap click event, WeChat Mini Program is invalid, and the return value is click event and parameters
events.description_zh: 按钮点击，请勿使用@tap点击事件，微信小程序无效，返回值为点击事件及参数

events.name: getuserinfo
events.description: When the user clicks this button, the obtained user information will be returned, and the value obtained from the detail of the returned parameter is the same as uni.getUserInfo
events.description_zh: 用户点击该按钮时，会返回获取到的用户信息，从返回参数的detail中获取到的值同uni.getUserInfo

events.name: error
events.description: When using open capabilities, an incorrect callback occurs
events.description_zh: 当使用开放能力时，发生错误的回调

events.name: opensetting
events.description: After opening the authorization settings page and closing the callback
events.description_zh: 在打开授权设置页并关闭后回调

events.name: launchapp
events.description: OPEN THE CALLBACK FOR APP SUCCESS
events.description_zh: 打开 APP 成功的回调
